text: Tara kakhana'o kona aslila kaja kare phelale kimba kona manda kaje jarita haye nijera upara juluma kare phelale allahake smarana kare ebam nijera papera jan'ya ksama prarthana kare. Allaha chara ara ke papa ksama karabena? Tara nijera krtakarmera jan'ya hathakarita pradarsana kare na ebam jene-sune ta'i karate thake na.
